abstract: A delegate method for modifying an annotation that represents a group of annotations that the framework combines into a cluster.
overview:
## Discussion

MapKit JS invokes this delegate method when it creates a cluster annotation, or when a member annotation within the cluster changes.

You can return any of the following:

The following example creates annotation clusters for cities and parks:

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/clustering-annotations].

items.description: An array of all the annotations on the map.
items.name: annotations

items.description: Returns the list of annotation objects within the specified map rectangle.
items.name: annotationsInMapRect(mapRect)

items.description: Adds an annotation to the map.
items.name: addAnnotation(annotation)

items.description: Adds an array of annotations to the map.
items.name: addAnnotations(annotations)

items.description: Removes an annotation from the map.
items.name: removeAnnotation(annotation)

items.description: Removes multiple annotations from the map.
items.name: removeAnnotations(annotations)
